mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT val) from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_zdhldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT DISTINCT lxbs from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_zdhldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT *, concat(#{zx}, '左幅') as name from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_zdhldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs = #{zx} ORDER BY zdbs,zh,FIELD(cd, ${result})
SELECT *,concat(#{zx}, '右幅') as name from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_zdhldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs = #{zx} ORDER BY zdbs,zh,FIELD(cd, ${result})

SELECT ldhd.*,fhlm.name from ( SELECT * from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_zdhldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and zh >= #{zhq} and zh <= #{zhz}) ldhd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_fhlm where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '左幅' ) fhlm ON ldhd.proname=fhlm.proname ORDER BY ldhd.zh

SELECT ldhd.*,fhlm.name from ( SELECT * from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_zdhldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and zh >= #{zhq} and zh <= #{zhz}) ldhd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_fhlm where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '右幅' ) fhlm ON ldhd.proname=fhlm.proname ORDER BY ldhd.zh
